event.name: PrmSendTooLarge
event.format_string: Parameter Id %d too large (%d bytes). Could not be sent
event.comment: Parameter too large to send to level 1 PrmDb

arg.name: prmId
arg.comment: Parameter that could not be sent

event.name: PrmSendBufferFull
event.format_string: Parameter send queue full. Will not send requested parameters back to L1 PrmDb
